page.title: 05The Police in Milton Keynes
page.content: Theft is the most common crime in Milton Keynes especially of cars and handbags.Police work depends a lot on public information and also computers. It only takes 27 seconds by computer to find the owner of the car and whether is is stolen or not. There is going to be a new prison in Milton Keynes for category B prisoners who are not dangerous.There is a lot of training involved in being a policeman.You do swimming,life saving, cross country and self defence. There are four police dogs in Milton Keynes. They are used to track people and also break up fights.There is a special department for road accidents although there are not many accidents in Milton Keynes because the road system is good.The law about seat belts is very effective.It has saved many lives.
